attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To legislate towards amending/repealing all petty legal restrictions and their accompanying costly and non-productive employment posts. 
To lift the dead hand of Govt off our backs and to let us get on with the job unhindered.
To streamline Public processes in order to make them cost-effective, quick and efficient.
To remove the legal requirement to belong to self-financing, self assessment schemes which are expensive, non-productive and which do nothing to enhance Public Safety.
The Building Regulations are one good example.
